title: Describe Your Feeling When Being Reincarnated as Your Husband’s Mistress
summary: Adrienne Trovica, the sole Grand Duchess of the Rhonta Empire, suddenly dies from a seizure and wakes up in the body of Countess Bleiah Acacia, who looks exactly like her. As it turns out, Bleiah is no ordinary woman. She was the mistress of Adrienne’s loving husband, Noevian Trovica. Adrienne, shocked by the news, attends her funeral as Bleiah to confirm the rumor. To her surprise, she sees a man crying for her at her grave. Who is this mystery man, and was everything that she knew about her husband a lie?

title: The Handmaiden Hates Childcare
summary: No summary available.

title: Roots of the Heart
summary: Sharon, is a warrior who defeated a vicious dragon a thousand years ago. One day, an unidentified man appears in front of Aru, who grew up longing for Sharon. "What? Are you that terrifying dragon? Besides, I'm that hero?!" A cute and sad romance fantasy of a dragon and a hero who reunited after a thousand years!

title: Who Kidnapped the Empress?
summary:
"All my people are dead... I just wanted to try my best. I just wanted to be a kind Empress. Why..."

Her injuries made her look so worn out… After torturing her for days and killing everyone she ever loved, the Emperor abandoned the Empress in the snowy mountains. In this heavy snowfall, the former Empress Roselyn had resigned herself and was ready to accept death. Her family, her friends, all her hard work for the people of the empire... There was no reason left for her to continue living. So she laid down on this pure white blanket, her body almost frozen, and watched the white snow be dyed in black. At first, the cold was painful, but the pain quickly subsided and so she thought that freezing to death just might not be all that bad.

“Being persecuted to death, lying alone as if you're ruling this snowy field...”

That man.

“If you don't need your life anymore... then pardon me, I’ll take it.”

He's the enemy general, Tamon Krasis.

“You’re mine now, Empress.”

She was abandoned by them, but he stole her and took her away. Who kidnapped the Empress?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/book/who-stole-the-empress?)

title: Overlord of Insects
summary: Having been transported into a world where everyone is a Job-Changer, Jiang Chen awakened the Insect Domination System! The little insects can evolve, attack, and extract talents! Most importantly, they can breed invincible natural disasters!

title: My Hot Harem Has Turned Cold On Me!
Reincarnated Escort Warrior
summary: Although an old porter has shown great determination and loyalty to his escort agency, he is never given the chance to become an armed escort due to his bad leg. But after sacrificing his life to keep a priceless treasure from a group of bandits, he is reborn as the 22-year-old Li Zhenglong who died 30 years ago! Now, in the body of the fourth young master of the Heavenly Dragon Escort Agency, will he finally realize his dream? Or will Li Zhenglong's terrible reputation ruin it all?

title: I’ll Borrow Your Face
summary:
1-3. Though I'd Always Loved You  
When Saki was in elementary school, she was dumped without notice by Chikage who was eight years her senior. She was extremely shocked because she believed that he would be her future husband! With a change of attitude, while at the high school entrance ceremony she decided that she dreamed of finding a new love, but at that time she met Chikage again, who has now become a teacher. As usual, she is shocked to realize that she still has feelings for Chikage. How does Chikage feel about Saki…?!  
  
4. My Lovely Beast  
Modoka decides to confess to her long-time crush, but accidentally gets the wrong person!?  
  
5. Love, to Burn, Fingertip  
Mari wants to be a manicurist, but is too shy to ask to paint someone's nails. Is her dream already out of reach?  
  
6. In my Shining Eyes, I See Your Face  
When Tae falls down the stairs, it might just change her world…

title: God of the Apocalypse
summary:
"An opportunity's an opportunity, no matter how slimy these gods who grant them may be. If they want a show, I'll give them one!"

Zephyr is the last human fighting evil in a world abandoned by the gods. When he is killed in battle by Tartarus, the god of destruction, all hope for humanity seems lost.

But Zephyr's fate is not sealed - the gods who find his battles entertaining have gifted him a second chance at life, as he is sent ten years into the past, back to when he was a slave instead of the most powerful human alive.

Can Zephyr get his revenge against Tartarus and save the woman he loves, or is he doomed to repeat the past?

---
[Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOqe_XcNCBo)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6325420), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=774044)

**Official Translations:**

* [German / Deutsch](https://www.webtoons.com/de/action/doom-breaker/list?title_no=3406)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/doom-breaker/list?title_no=3217)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://manga.line.me/periodic/tag_item_list?tag_id=1014363&t=1657211210896)
* [Spanish / Español](https://www.webtoons.com/es/action/doom-breaker/list?title_no=3342)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/fantasy/battle-god/list?title_no=3190)

title: Potion Witch
summary:
"I want you to make me a love potion."

The “Witch of the Lake” had her heart broken when the object of her one-sided affection requested that she make him a love potion.

If that’s the case, then I wish to spend more time with him, even if it’s just up until the preparations for the love potion are complete. That was what I had told myself, and yet…

The romantic tale of a reclusive witch and a solemn knight that begins from unrequited love.

---

[Official English Light Novel](http://www.crossinfworld.com/news-articles/New-Release-Hello-I-am-a-Witch-and-my-Crush-Wants-me-to-Make-a-Love-Potion.html)

title: Primordial Ten Fiends: Others Tame Beasts, I Tame Beast Girls
summary: After three years of lying low, Lin Han awakened the Beast Taming System and gained ten ultra-fierce beast girls! Tearing apart enemies by day and taming beast girls by night, he was directly drained by them into becoming the pinnacle of global combat power!

title: It Wasn’t Love at First Sight
summary:
Duke Adler, referred to as the greatest man of the Asgard Empire, is as handsome as a sculpture. However, he is also a serial killer, playing the role of the villain in a novel. On top of that, Princess Charlotte, who was politically married to him, was fated to be murdered on their first night together.

The predicament is that I am the princess fated to die at his hands on that night.

"It's a political marriage, and it's not as if we want to see each other anyway, so let's just meet on our wedding day."

It was evident that the villain was displeased with the idea of marrying me. Hence, I made a decision.

"It was love at first sight. So, please go out with me!"

With only six months left until the wedding, I resolved to carry out an undercover investigation by pretending to date him. People wouldn't believe my words, so I had no choice but to gather evidence myself.

Even though she had planned to reveal the fact that he was a serial killer by hovering around him...

***

"You said you fell in love with me at first sight, so what were you doing here with another man?"

A cold voice flowed into my ears.

"W-What do you mean? I was just dancing to ensure there were no disruptions at the banquet..."

The nape of my neck heated up from the hot breath brushing against the outer edges of my ear. The contrast between his warm touches and the cool tone of his voice intoxicated me even more.

"You called his name so affectionately, as he held you tightly in his arms."
"Gasp."

Unable to escape the strong scent that clouded my senses, I held my breath. My whole body tingled from the strange sensation spreading from my neck to the rest of my body. He tilted his head and said...

"If there's someone else's scent coming from you... I'll have an urge to kill."

title: Regas
summary: In this kingdom, the power of the dragon is passed down through the royal bloodline, and these royal family members require the special help of dragon tamers, otherwise known as the "Regas." However, the current prince’s blood bears the markings of an extremely powerful dragon’s might. While everyone feared and avoided the aggressive young prince, Abel, a man trained in the traditional ways of the Regas, approaches him and teaches him about the world little by little. Will the young prince finally be able to open up his heart to this Regas and gain control of his powers amidst all the political strife…?

title: The Mysterious World’s Greatest Martial Artist Little Prince
The Genius Who Sees Through the World
summary: As a child, Shin Woo-jin was kidnapped and locked away in a warehouse, forced to live as a slave. But against all odds, he was rescued and finally stepped into the outside world. Though free, Woo-jin wasn’t like other children. He had an extraordinary gift—the ability to read people. By observing the smallest facial expressions and unconscious gestures, he could see through their thoughts, emotions, and intentions with near-perfect accuracy. Like a profiler, like a modern-day Sherlock, Woo-jin learned to navigate the world, one observation at a time. But for someone who sees too much, living an ordinary life is the hardest thing of all. All he ever wanted was a peaceful, simple life. But the world had other plans. “As I thought… living a normal life is far too difficult.”

title: Flowers are flowers, leaves are leaves
I randomly have a new career every week
summary: After being fired from his company, Lin Yi accidentally gets the All-Pro Experience System. Lin Yi relies on the various career arrangements and generous rewards given by the system to achieve his ambition and path to wealth step by step, becoming the ultimate all-powerful big brother who dominates the world.

title: Supreme Curse Master
summary: Ye Lin transmigrated into a world overrun by demons and monsters. On the day of his class transfer, he became an SSS-rank Forbidden Spellcaster—and was immediately met with ridicule. Why? Because casting forbidden spells costs lifespan, and most Forbidden Spellcasters die young. But only Ye Lin knows: with his immortal body, the profession’s fatal flaw means nothing to him. When Ye Lin casually unleashed hundreds of forbidden spells in a single move, everyone around him was terrified. “How many lives do you have?!” “You’re using forbidden spells like normal attacks?!”

title: Don’t Trust the Heroine
summary:
I refuse to be taken for granted any longer!
After six years of waiting patiently for my fiancé to return from battle, he shows up with a woman carrying his child. What's worse, I now have to live with her, watching as he neglects me yet showers her with affection. I cannot stand it! Should I stay and stand my ground or bid this place farewell?

---
**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/17199)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E6%94%BE%E7%94%9F%E6%B8%A3%E7%94%B7%E4%B8%8D%E5%86%8D%E5%9B%9E%E6%94%B6/456)
* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/1179)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Dont-Pick-Up-What-Youve-Thrown-Away/663)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/120623)

title: The Masters Are Subscribing To Me
summary:
There are three female masters who are known to be the strongest in the world. The only thing they can’t get their hands on… their ideal man.

“If there are no ideal men, why not raise one ourselves!?”

As they skim over the list of candidates, the ladies' eyes all fixate on one boy. A level 0 with no shred of talent…
___
**Character Designer:** [Tajima Ryuushi](https://mangadex.org/author/3ac15f57-6a12-4018-b549-30aab86fc6c8)

title: F-Class Destiny Hunter
summary:
In a world of abilities known as fortunes, Seo Gangrim brings misfortune to those around him. Despite his low rank, people fear his power to steal fortunes from the dead.

After his entire sect is annihilated by an assassin, Gangrim returns to the past, desperate to prevent its grisly end. He intends to make a difference this time but realizes that even fortunes aren't set in stone.

Will Gangrim be able to save his comrades from their unjust deaths, or will he only bring doom to them all again?

title: Genius Archer’s Streaming
summary:
Former archery prodigy Yoo Sanghyun was destined for greatness until an injury forced him to quit. Though his coach helped him secure a stable job, he never felt like he belonged. Frustrated, he leaves it all behind to pursue game streaming. 

Leveraging his incredible archery skills and the charm of his noob character, he quickly rises to fame as "Almond." Now, he's determined to dominate the gaming world, but will his virtual success translate into something greater in real life?

title: It’s not a case of being loved
summary: No summary available.

title: Boundless Necromancer
summary:
[The Tower of Trials has selected all suitable candidates from Earth.  Please select your difficulty.]

Seong-yun Han was just a boy when his parents were killed by monsters unleashed during a mysterious calamity called the “Dungeon Break.”

Seven years later, Seong-yun is devastated to find that his grinding efforts to become a Hunter, fierce warriors who seek out and destroy monsters, are entirely in vain, as his fighting attributes have not increased at all.

Seong-yun’s world flips on a dime when he accepts an invitation to join the Tower of Trials, an otherworldly realm where challengers must overcome trials that pit them against monsters and humans alike!

title: Tyrant of the Otherworld Prison: My Shadow Can Evolve Infinitely
summary: In the year 2035, rifts to alien realms tore through the world’s defenses. Swarms of insectoids and beastkin ravaged the land, and humanity struggled to survive through the strength of “Evolvers.” Li Yi was betrayed by his teammates during an attack by alien beings and left for dead. On the brink of death, he awakened the “Titan Shadow” System—his shadow could evolve without limits! It could devour ores to enhance defense, tear through enemies to form deadly blades, and even split into an army of shadow soldiers… From insect hives to haunted lands, wherever his shadow passed, enemies were shredded into pulp. This is the revenge of the weak—begun with a shadow that devours all.

title: I’m a Villainess Devoted to My Favorite Character, So What?
I Build an Industrial Empire on the Magic Continent
Her Marriage Was Called Off at Daytime, the Cutely Fierce Commander Asked Her For a Hug at Night
You Can Hear It
summary: Ryouran High School is a private arts academy where geniuses in every field—music, dance, fashion—gather. But in reality, looks decide the students' success, not talent. My sister, Shiika Ikebukuro, is a shut-in who can't do anything without her older brother, and I was sure that devastating lack of charisma would doom her. But I know a secret. Though you'd never guess it, behind her mask, the internet sensation VSINGER is none other than my sister, Shiika! Her voice is one of a kind, but will it be enough to overcome Ryouran High's entire social order?

title: Hold Her Tighter So She Wouldn’t Run Away
summary: After three failed marriages, Archduke Theo de Phoenix has long accepted that love simply isn’t in the cards for him. After all, who could love a war-hardened monster like him? So when his fourth bride arrives, he greets her covered in blood, gives her a shabby attic for a room, and keeps his distance. Surely, this one will run too. But Yuelina is not like the others. To Theo’s disbelief, she welcomes his presence and fills his cold world with warmth and light. As the walls around his heart begin to thaw, will Theo finally allow himself to love?

title: Records of the Demonic Path’s Return
summary:
The worst talent that no one can compete with. Unstoppable Demon God, Dan Uhyeon.

A thousand years after being sealed for the misdeed. A thousand years was enough to get rid of Dan Uhyeon's sense of superiority. A world that has changed, solitude with no one knows, and the only thing left is despondency and emptiness.

"Time goes like the wind. There's really nothing left."

A little girl who appeared in front of Dan Uhyeon lost her purpose and will to live aimlessly, Hwa Somi. For a girl who seems to have nowhere to lean on, Dan Uhyeon feels the same and gradually begins to open the door of his mind.

"I'm Dan Uhyeon. Come with me."

The story of a warrior with an icy heart and acute and pure girl The story of an unusual family's life in the midfield will warm your heart.

---
The Ultimate Martial Divine Demon, Dan Woohyun, was sealed up because he was too strong for the world to handle.  After a millennium passed by, he was released from his seal and felt like everything was meaningless as he wandered the back alleys… 

Just as he fell down because he was sick of the world, a small hand appeared in front of him.

"What's this?" asked Dan Woohyun. 

"A dumpling!" came a reply. 

This was the first time in his life that someone had been nice to him without any impure intentions, and that changed his fate. This is the chronicle of a martial god who traversed through a thousand years of time and space!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59492385)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16060)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112858)

title: The Monster Princess’s Courtship
summary:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)

title: I’m Done Being a Hero, Even If It’s Retirement
summary: Everyone's shocked when 9-year-old prodigy Adelia Ester suddenly refuses to enroll in the elite knights' academy. They don't know that Adelia was magically sent back in time after wasting her life on the battlefield and suffering an early death! Now, Adelia's out to protect her peace from her ex-boss, the evil future emperor, by setting her ally on the throne instead. Will Adelia succeed in one last mission and finally retire for good? Or will she find herself forced to be a hero once more?

title: Doberman
summary:
Eden City, the second Las Vegas and a place where all pleasures of this world converge. Sarin comes to Eden City, trying to find the biological father of her niece, Hayan, using the diary of her twin sister, Irin, who died in a car accident. Along the way, Sarin encounters Owen, the king of Eden City.

Though frightened by Owen’s forceful attitude and the strange gaze that seems to desire her, Sarin chooses to stay by his side for the sake of her niece, Hayan. As she gets closer to Owen, she starts to uncover the darkness that looms over Eden City. Despite this, staying by Owen’s side becomes more natural for Sarin.

However, Sarin is also hiding a secret of her own…

title: I Can’t Wait To Eat You
summary: Bakuya, a second-year high school student suffering from insomnia, however, one night, he meets Kimidori, a first-year girl who enjoys eating cup noodles yakisoba. Kimidori claims she can help Bakuya sleep; nevertheless, she enjoys playing pranks on him whenever she gets the chance.

title: In The Night, At The Duke’s Mansion
Incentive
summary:
Taekyung, the CEO of Sona Cosmetics, is a flawless and coldly rational boss.
Yuju, who had been harboring a one-sided love for him,
grows weary of being seen only as his chief secretary.
Unable to suppress her feelings any longer,
she submits her resignation after a year of silent longing.
But then...

“I forgot to give you your incentive.”
“What do you mean...?”
“I’ll give you what you want most.”
“Sorry?”
“Even if it means offering my body—your incentive.”

Without hesitation, he places his hand over her white blouse.

“But before we do this, let me make one thing clear. If you pull away again afterward, I won’t hold back next time.”

A secret temptation approaches her just as she tries to quit—<Incentive>.

title: After the School Belle Dumped Me, I Became a Martial Arts God
Loved by The Dead
summary:
After losing his girlfriend to a brave hero, Toru is expelled from his S-Rank party. With a feeling of sadness and pain in his heart, he defeats a demon he meets outside the city, and his ability [to save experience] is broken! Toru becomes level 300 in the blink of an eye! With this power that far surpasses that of heroes, there is nothing that can stop him. Kaede, a slave he met on his journey, forms a group called the "Manyu Brigade", and easily completes dungeons, acquires the legendary sacred weapons, and thanks to his skills, his friends level up easily! He rescued a countess who was attacked by bandits on the road, and befriended a legendary beast. Oru's journey continues at a leisurely pace, as he repeatedly encounters various people along the way, while his former party of heroes are deprived of opportunities to play an active role and fall into decline.
___
[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9483ge/)

title: The Male Leads Were Stolen by the Extra
summary:
Reborn as Selonia Bessin, the heroine of a romance fantasy novel, a girl is thrust into a demon-slaying mission with the novel's three male leads. They successfully defeat the demon lord, but Selonia falls unconscious for three months on the journey back. Upon awakening, she discovers the trio is now enamored with Grace Benet, an unknown extra. Moreover, the supposedly defeated demon lord is back in hot human form! Why has he returned, and who is this mysterious Grace stealing the limelight?

---
A woman who has lost her male leads to an extra who did not appear in the original story... That's me.

Selonia fell into a coma on the way back from defeating the Demon King. After wandering through death for several months, she survived, but what? 

“I want you to break off the engagement. I want to hurry up to marry Grace.” 

“I want you to pretend my knight’s oath to you didn't happen.” 

“Give me back my heart. I’ll give it to Grace.” 

The fiancé who was the male lead, the paladin and the dragon who were the sub-male leads, and the fellows all turned away. These reckless bastards! There was a lot of cursing, but what can I do to stop it? I was trying to start a new life in a cool way. By the way… 

“Do you know me?” 

How is the dead demon king alive? 

“What, I don’t know…”

“No, you know me. tell me Who am I?” 

To make matters worse, the Demon King, who has no memory, sticks to my side and does not leave. Inevitably, I tried my best to prevent the return of the Demon King. 

“How can I always hold your hand?” 

Why is it not enough to spit out vulgar words? 

“Are you going to kill all those who left you? Just speak.” 

He’s even going to kill the male leads for me!

title: Spoiled Fairytale
summary:
Late spring—on a street unusually damp and buzzing with life.
Seohee, worn out and withering under her parents’ contempt and neglect, finds herself entangled with a libertine infamous for his promiscuous private life.

“Ah. I didn’t really plan to go this far….”
“……”
“I’ll be spending the night.”

A man who freely crosses the line between kindness and cruelty.
A man who tosses around love carelessly.
A man who mocks fairytales, calling them hollow illusions—Joo Taebaek.

Wrapped in all things vivid and dazzling, he crashes into Seohee like a violent wave, shaking her to the core.

“Alright. I’ll keep your secret.”
“…Really?”
“In exchange, let me screw you—loud and wild.”

A filthy act of rebellion.
A fleeting moment of euphoria.

“No need to overthink it.”

She thought that if she assimilated with him, she might at least share in his counterfeit love.
So, she willingly threw herself into a fleeting flame.

Was she really insane? Who taught her how to seduce a man like him?

“Um… it’s over now, right?”

Seohee slightly lowered her head toward a completely dazed Taebaek.

“I have to go before midnight.”

So then—
Who really got swept up in the fire?

title: Cavier Falcon Princess
summary:
Zelle, the eighth royal princess of Roymonde, who was driven to the brink of defeat in the war. She was kidnapped by the enemy, and when she woke up... She became a bird?!

Fortunately or unfortunately, as the messenger bird of Commander-in-Chief, Valhayle! She struggles for her country even though she is in a bird’s body.

But you can't even do as much as treat me like a bird!!

---
After losing consciousness while fleeing the war raging in Roymund Kingdom, Princess Zeline wakes up in the body of a messenger falcon! She’s now the bird in charge of delivering information for Commander Valhyle and his army, who are searching for the remaining royal descendants. She may be tiny and feathered, but Zeline is determined to use her missions to find out what happened to her family. Can this little birdie gain the skeptical commander’s trust and give her kingdom new wings?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%A0%84%EB%A0%B9%EC%83%88-%EC%99%95%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/2531), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57066133)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/18033), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-falcon-princess/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%82%B3%E4%BB%A4%E9%B3%A5%E5%85%AC%E4%B8%BB/184)
* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/41)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Putri-Elang-Pembawa-Pesan/95)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/75612)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%88%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%8D%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%84%E0%B8%AA%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A3/205)

title: The Wicked Ladies in Waiting
summary: Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

title: Kill The Dragon
summary:
The human race plunged into a war against dragons, who have invaded the earth. At the same time, among the humans arose people with supernatural powers, called psykers.

Through the countless sacrifices of psykers, the war seemed to be coming to an end with the human race as the victors. But when a psyker with the ability to see the future foretold that the dragons will be returning in 15 years, the people established Ark, a facility to train children born with psychic abilities to prepare for the last war of the human race.

There are only three years remaining until the prophesized war. What will happen next?!

---
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/kill-the-dragon/list?title_no=4618)

title: I Became a Civil Servant in a Magical World
summary:
"Monday? Hate it. Tuesday? Hate it. And what I hate the most? Going to work."
The civil servant Hae Sunal feels this way. In his previous life, all he wished for was to be able to use magic as normally as anyone else, so he invented a way for it to happen… In his next life. But now that he's in this new life, due to ‘magic’, he’s been living a far noisier life than expected.
“Hello, I am Hae Sunal, a member of the Special Department for Cross-Species Civil Complaints and Resolution.”

title: The Bully In-Charge
summary:
Alex, a holy knight, is suddenly expelled from his adventurers' party.

He tries to live a comfortable life by accepting a quest to cultivate a remote area, but suddenly he is given the extra skill "Slave Release"...?

Summon beautiful girl slaves and cultivate a demon territory overrun with demons! A slow life of harem in a fantasy world is about to begin!

title: It’s Annoying Because My Childhood Friend Is An Archmage
summary: A cynical noblewoman cursed to hear others' thoughts struggles to control her childhood friend—a wildly powerful mage whose flirting is as explosive as his unchecked magic. His outrageous marriage proposals ("I'll conquer the empire for you!") and her exasperated damage control create a hilarious magical rom-com where keeping him sane might just drive her mad first.
